repos.name: supermemory
repos.description_original: Memory engine and app that is extremely fast, scalable. The Memory API for the AI era.
repos.description_cn: 一款基于 TypeScript 开发的 AI API 服务，今日新增 433 星，广受开发者好评
repos.target_audience: AI 开发者和研究人员
repos.problem_solved: 快速上手 AI 相关开发
repos.readme_excerpt: - Add Memories from Any Content: Easily add memories from URLs, PDFs, and plain text—just paste, upload, or link. - Chat with Your Memories: Converse with your stored content using natural language chat. - Supermemory MCP Integration: Seamlessly connect with all major AI tools (Claude, Cursor,...

repos.name: pi-mono
repos.description_original: AI agent toolkit: coding agent CLI, unified LLM API, TUI & web UI libraries, Slack bot, vLLM pods
repos.description_cn: 一款基于 TypeScript 的大语言模型AI Agent 框架，帮助开发者快速接入和使用 LLM 能力
repos.domain: 大语言模型 (LLM) / AI Agent 智能体
repos.target_audience: NLP 开发者、对话系统研发人员
repos.problem_solved: 快速接入和使用大语言模型
